attributes.action: Foreigners commiting crime in the Uk should be kicked out
attributes.additional_details: Foreigners commiting crimes in the UK that warrants a jail or supended jail sentence should automatiically be sent home after a jail sentence is served.  And if there life is in danger then should be held in custody untill such time thay can return home. All proceeds of crime should be confiscated to go to victims of crime.And any Person not british by birth and has become a british citizenship on commiting such crime will have there citizenship revoked and face the same punishment.There will be no appeal and thay will not be allowed back to the uk for any reason.
